CustomField.formula: IF(NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(tdc_tvte__Phone_Verification_Status__c))), CASE( tdc_tvte__Phone_Verification_Status__c, 'Valid', IMAGE('/resource/tdc_tvte__VTMMessage/img/ValidPhone.png','Valid'), 'Invalid', IMAGE('/resource/tdc_tvte__VTMMessage/img/InvalidPhone.png','Invalid'), tdc_tvte__Result__c) + ' ' + BR() + tdc_tvte__Verified_Phone__c ,IMAGE('/resource/tdc_tvte__VTMMessage/img/Notverified1.png','Not Verified Yet'))
CustomField.label: Phone Status
